title: Ideal gas in closed variable volume container

content.prompt: An ideal gas in a closed container of variable volume experiences an increase in temperature while the pressure remains unchanged. What happens to the average kinetic energy of the molecules and the volume of the gas as the temperature increases?

choices.label:
Average Kinetic Energy Volume
Decreases. Volume Remains unchanged

Average Kinetic Energy Volume
Decreases Increases

Average Kinetic Energy: Remains unchanged. Volume: Increases

Average Kinetic Energy Volume
Remains unchanged Increases

Average Kinetic Energy Volume
Increases Increases

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure
